text: vaastav mein, maheenon kee sankhya baarah maheene hain, allaah ke lekh mein, jis din se usane aakaashon tatha dharatee kee rachana kee hai. unamen se chaar haî€¼raam (sammaanit)[1] maheene hain. yahee seedha dharm hai. atah apane praanon par atyaachaar[2] na karo tatha mishranavaadiyon se sab milakar yudhd karo., jaise ve tumase milakar yudhd karate hain aur vishvaas rakho ki allaah aagyaakeeriyon ke saath hai
